text: @realDonaldTrump You deranged loser. COVID19 is STILL spreading, unchecked & undetected across our country, you MORON. This isn’t an ENDLESS VACATION. Smart people r staying safe-but hey, PLEASE let your people loose. Hopefully they have healthcare & your non-existent support when they get sick.
